full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## E6HAL-230003 Solicitation for Fresh Fruit and Vegetables

### Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on Behalf of Department of National Defence (DND) and Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

#### Request for Standing Offer (RSO) Solicitation

PSPC invites qualified suppliers to submit a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of fresh fruit and vegetables to multiple locations in Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Tender Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS3836908865
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: February 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: February 21, 2023

**Scope of Work**

The successful supplier will be responsible for providing fresh fruit and vegetables to support the operational requirements of DND and CCG. The delivery zones and locations will be identified in the solicitation document. Suppliers must be able to deliver to both static kitchens and vessels.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection will be based on the lowest price.

**Important Information**

* The RMSO will be awarded for a one-year period.
* Delivery will be required for both static kitchens and vessels.
* Suppliers must be able to provide fresh fruit and vegetables within the delivery zones and locations identified in the solicitation document.
* Log into SAP Ariba to view this opportunity: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15303015](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15303015)

**Contact Information**

* Tara Sheppard
* PSPC/SPAC
* tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15303015](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15303015)

This is a competitive solicitation, open to all interested suppliers. Please log into SAP Ariba to review the solicitation document and register an interest. Suppliers must submit their proposal electronically by the closing date. Failure to submit a valid proposal by the deadline may result in the proposal being rejected. Suppliers are encouraged to review the solicitation document carefully to ensure that their proposal meets all the evaluation criteria.  Note that this is a "Request for Standing Offer" tender, where the selected bidder will be awarded a contract for a one year period to supply fresh fruit and vegetables. The winner
